COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_IMG = #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_DESC = #{productDesc,jdbcType=CHAR},

PRODUCT_ORDER = #{productOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update product set COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_IMG = #{productImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_DESC = #{productDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, PRODUCT_ORDER = #{productOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from product where COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND PRODUCT_NAME Like CONCAT('%',#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND STATE = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createTimeBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY STATE DESC,PRODUCT_ORDER DESC
mapper.update:

#{productId}
mapper.select:
select
from product where COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND STATE != 1 ORDER BY STATE DESC,PRODUCT_ORDER DESC
